Name: Karaikal
Region: Eastern coast of India in Karaikal around 300 km along the coast south of Chennai Port and around 360 km along the coast north of Tuticorin Port

Name: Paradeep
Region: East coast of India in Jagatsinghpur district of Odisha. It is situated at confluence of the Mahanadi river and the Bay of Bengal

Name: Vishakhapatnam
Region: Located midway between the Chennai and Kolkata Ports

Name: New Mangalore
Region: North of the confluence of Gurupura (Phalguni) river to Arabian sea. It is 170 nautical miles (310 km) south of Mormugao Port and 191 nautical miles (354 km) north of Kochi Port.

Name: Jawaharlal Nehru Port
Region: Arabian Sea is accessed via Thane Creek

Name: Krishnapatnam
Region: Located about 190 km north of the Chennai Port and 18 km east of the city of Nellore.

Name: Mundra
Region: North shores of the Gulf of Kutch near
